Binary: gcin, gcin-data, gcin-tables, libgcin, gcin-gtk2-immodule, gcin-gtk3-immodule, gcin-qt5-immodule, gcin-anthy
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dpkg-dev (>= 1.16.1~), libanthy-dev, libayatana-appindicator3-dev, libcurl4-openssl-dev | libcurl-dev, libgtk2.0-dev (>= 2.20.0), libgtk-3-dev, libxtst-dev, qtbase5-private-dev, qtchooser
Description: GTK+ based input method for Chinese users gcin is a GTK+ based input method which focused mainly on Traditional Chinese. However, it is also very useful for Simplified Chinese, Japanese, and many other languages.
Package-List: gcin deb utils optional arch=any gcin-anthy deb utils optional arch=any gcin-data deb utils optional arch=all gcin-gtk2-immodule deb utils optional arch=any gcin-gtk3-immodule deb utils optional arch=any gcin-qt5-immodule deb utils optional arch=any gcin-tables deb utils optional arch=any libgcin deb utils optional arch=any
Uploaders: Yao Wei (魏銘廷) <mwei@lxde.org>, ChangZhuo Chen (陳昌倬) <czchen@debian.org>, Shih-Yuan Lee (FourDollars) <fourdollars@gmail.com>,
